Life is just a game we all play.
Cereal is just cold breakfast soup.
Gravity is just Earth hugging us.
Dreams are just movies in our minds.
Did I leave the oven on?
Even a balloon half inflated, is completely full
Does a straw have one hole, or two?
Nothing is on fire. Fire is on things.
Crabs probably think that fish can fly.
What am I having for dinner tonight?
